name: Morpheus
description: A modeling and simulation environment for the study of multi-scale and multicellular systems, able to couple ODEs, PDEs and cellular Potts models.
developer: Morpheus.Lab, TUD Dresden University of Technology, Germany

processes.name: CellGrowth
processes.description: Process describing the growth of cells over time.

processes.name: CellDivision
processes.description: Process describing the division of cells.

processes.name: ChemicalDiffusion
processes.description: Process describing the diffusion of chemicals within the tissue.

processes.name: CellProliferation
processes.description: Process describing the proliferation and growth of cells.

processes.name: CellMigration
processes.description: Process describing the movement and migration of cells.

processes.name: CellDeath
processes.description: Process describing programmed cell death (apoptosis) and necrosis.

pde_boundary_conditions.description: Dirichlet boundary condition for chemical concentration
Neumann boundary condition for chemical flux

geometric_constraints.description: Periodic boundary condition for cell movement
